creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two gold and red fabric covered albums enclosed in tri-folding blue case; albums contain circular vignettes of landscapes
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscriptions, Seals, and Labels

various inscriptions throughout
markings: various seals throughout; labels on outer cover R side: [Taigado Teiryo / Juben Jugi]; label inside cover R side: [Taigado Teiryo / Juben/ Jugi / 1903]
signed: front cover L side; front cover ULQ
title: Juben Jugi, one of pair
